page.description: Alpha Anywhere provides the following Xdialog functions.

case.title: A5_GENERIC_PRINT()
case.description: Prints the contents of a text control on an Xdialog form.

case.title: A5_GENERICSEARCHREPLACE()
case.description: Allows you to search and replace text in a control on an Xdialog form.

case.title: A5_OWNER_DRAW_LIST_FMT()
case.description: Adds 'owner-draw' formatting command to a CR-LF delimited list.

case.title: A5_XdialogPreProcess()
case.description: Adds help text to an Xdialog.

case.title: KEYLIST_BUILD()
case.description: Returns specially formatted data for display of advanced record lists in an Xdialog form.

case.title: UI_DLG_BOX()
case.description: Displays a dialog box and returns a character string.

case.title: UI_DLG_COMMIT()
case.description: Forces a dialog to commit its contents.

case.title: UI_DLG_CONTROL_ ANCHOR_FROM_POS()
case.description: Detects which anchor button receives the button click.

case.title: UI_DLG_CONTROL_FROM_POS()
case.description: Returns the definition of the control that the mouse is over.

case.title: UI_DLG_CREATE()
case.description: Creates an invisible modeless dialog, which can later be displayed.

case.title: UI_DLG_CTL_CURRENT()
case.description: Retrieves the definition of the current control in the named dialog.

case.title: UI_DLG_CTL_GOTO()
case.description: Sets focus to a control in a dialog. Creates a pointer that allows you to manipulate the size and position of objects within an Xdialog box.

case.title: UI_DLG_DOM()
case.description: Creates a pointer that allows you to manipulate the size and position of objects within an Xdialog box.

case.title: UI_DLG_EVAL()
case.description: Evaluates an expression in the context of a modeless Xdialog.

case.title: UI_DLG_EVAL_VALID()
case.description: Determines whether a variable exists in a modeless dialog.

case.title: UI_DLG_EVENT()
case.description: Invokes an action event in the specified dialog.

case.title: UI_DLG_HELP()
case.description: Displays a help topic for the current dialog.

case.title: UI_DLG_HIDE()
case.description: Hides the specified dialog.

case.title: UI_DLG_IS_ACTIVE()
case.description: Returns .T. (TRUE) if any component of an Xdialog has focus.

case.title: UI_DLG_IS_MAXIMIZED()
case.description: Indicates whether the specified dialog is maximized.

case.title: UI_DLG_IS_MINIMIZED()
case.description: Indicates whether the specified dialog is minimized.

case.title: UI_DLG_MAXIMIZE()
case.description: Maximizes the specified dialog.

case.title: UI_DLG_MINIMIZE()
case.description: Minimizes the specified dialog.

case.title: UI_DLG_MODAL()
case.description: Makes a modeless dialog box behave like a modal dialog box.

case.title: UI_DLG_MOVE()
case.description: Moves a dialog to a new position.

case.title: UI_DLG_NAVIGATE()
case.description: Moves the cursor to the next or previous control on an Xdialog form.

case.title: UI_DLG_OPTIONAL_EVENT()
case.description: Sends an event to a modeless dialog, but does not generate an error if the dialog does not exist.

case.title: UI_DLG_PARENT_GET()
case.description: When used by an embedded dialog, returns the name of its parent dialog.

case.title: UI_DLG_REFRESH()
case.description: Refreshes the contents of a dialog.

case.title: UI_DLG_REFRESH_TARGETED()
case.description: Refreshes a selected list of controls on a dialog.

case.title: UI_DLG_REMEMBERED_CLEAR()
case.description: Clears any remembered alignment, size, or position data.

case.title: UI_DLG_REMEMBERED_GET()
case.description: Retrieves alignment, size, and position data for a dialog box.

case.title: UI_DLG_RESIZE()
case.description: Resizes a dialog box.

case.title: UI_DLG_SHOW()
case.description: Displays a dialog box.

case.title: UI_INFO_DLG_ DEF_CLIENT_HEIGHT()
case.description: Returns the height of the specified embedded Xdialog.

case.title: UI_INFO_DLG_ DEF_CLIENT_WIDTH()
case.description: Returns the width of the specified embedded Xdialog.

case.title: UI_INFO_DLG_DEF_EVENTS()
case.description: Retrieves events for a dialog.

case.title: UI_INFO_DLG_DEF_HEIGHT()
case.description: Retrieves the height of a dialog in units (specified by the {UNITS} command).

case.title: UI_INFO_DLG_DEF_LISTS()
case.description: Retrieves the lists for a dialog.

case.title: UI_INFO_DLG_DEF_VARS()
case.description: Retrieves the variables of a dialog.

case.title: UI_INFO_DLG_DEF_WIDTH()
case.description: Retrieves the width of a dialog in units (specified by the {UNITS} command).

case.title: UI_MODELESS_DLG_BOX()
case.description: Creates a modeless dialog.

case.title: UI_MODELESS_DLG_BUTTON()
case.description: Returns the name of the button being pressed on a modeless dialog box.

case.title: UI_MODELESS_DLG_ BUTTON_RESET()
case.description: Resets the value of a button on a modeless dialog box.

case.title: UI_MODELESS_DLG_CLOSE()
case.description: Closes a modeless dialog box.

case.title: UI_MODELESS_DLG_EXIST()
case.description: Indicates whether a modeless dialog box exists.

case.title: UI_MODELESS_DLG_REFRESH()
case.description: Refreshes a modeless dialog box.

case.title: UI_MODELESS_DLG_SETFOCUS()
case.description: Sets focus to a modeless dialog box.

case.title: UI_MODELESS_DLG_SIZING()
case.description: Returns .T. (TRUE) when a modeless dialog box is in the process of being resized.

case.title: UI_WAIT_UNTIL()
case.description: Pauses a script until UI_MODELESS_DLG_EXIST() returns .T. (TRUE) or .F. (FALSE). Use this function when the testing if some UI component is present.
